|blank1_info_sec1 = |website = |footnotes = }} Orellana () is an inland province of Ecuador. The capital is Puerto Francisco de Orellana (also known as Coca). It was created on July 30, 1998, from part of Napo Province. == Cantons == The province is divided into four cantons. The following table lists each with its population at the 2001 census, its area in square kilometres (km²), and the name of the canton seat or capital.Cantons of Ecuador. Statoids.com. Retrieved 4 November 2009. Canton Pop. (2001) Area (km²) Seat/Capital Aguarico 4,658 11,358 Nuevo Rocafuerte Francisco de Orellana 42,010 6,995 Puerto Francisco de Orellana (Coca) Joya de los Sachas 26,363 1,195 La Joya de los Sachas Loreto 13,462 2,127 Loreto ==References== Category:1998 establishments
